pages.text: Welcome to Crossroads!$(br2)Crossroads is a mod about automation. Almost everything in the mod can be automated with the tools Crossroads adds, which are usually simple single-purpose tools that can be assembled into complex systems.$(br2)Rube Goldberg machines will be the simplest way to do things.

In this section of the book, you'll get a broad introduction to various systems in the mod- ideal for beginners. All the information in these entries are also in the respective guide categories, but it should be easiest to understand as a beginner from this section.$(br2)If you have any questions or suggestions, feel free to join the $(l:https://discord.gg/6g47knp)Discord$(/l), and if you find any bugs, please report them either on the $(l:https://discord.gg/6g47knp)Discord$(/l) or $(l:https://github.com/Da-Technomancer/Crossroads/)Github$(/l).
